feat: Complete Phase 7+ floor-jeolju backend implementation

## Backend API \(DashboardAPI.gs\)
- Add floorId column \(Column 19\) to schema
- Implement getFloorData\(\) for floor-specific data retrieval
- Implement getAllFloorStats\(\) for dashboard overview
- Add floor filter parameter to getColumns\(\) API
- Add migration functions: migrateAddFloorIdColumn\(\), generateAllFloorData\(\)
- Update API documentation to v2.1

## Frontend \(index.html\)
- Connect loadFloorData\(\) to real backend API
- Add updateGridData\(\) for grid transformation
- Add jeolju statistics update from API response
- Implement floor navigation with API integration

## Project Structure
- Archive legacy dashboard/ to archive/dashboard_static_v1/
- Activate syncAnalysisToDashboard_\(\) in main\(\)
- Update README.md with current project structure

## Documentation
- Add floor_jeolju_implementation_plan.md
- Add phase7_verification_report_ko.md
- Add work_log.md
- Update development_roadmap.md
